channel.title: Comments on: Done the Impossible
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: m
item.dc:creator: m
item.description: I loved them very very much, as well as the characters on Buffy. I think that someone at Fox needs to get a stake through the heart (just a thought). I'm not sure money could cure all of the heartbreak Joss felt, but it would be worth a try...
item.content:encoded: I loved them very very much, as well as the characters on Buffy. I think that someone at Fox needs to get a stake through the heart (just a thought). I’m not sure money could cure all of the heartbreak Joss felt, but it would be worth a try…
